Articles.Content:
I paid for 1.0 

I want 1.0

Gimme 1.0
Yep. Looking forward to starting a new save.

> 
> I just counted six on my hard drive... o\_O

I just counted **twelve** on my hard drive... o\_O All the way from 0.16 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T15:01:38Z" title="04/25/2015 03:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Magion**

I'll be upgrading via nheab as soon as I can. If it takes some time for my modlist to be updated, then that's OK, because I've already backed up my 0.90 install in case I get tired of trying 1.0 stock (which won't happen anytime soon).
Yes. I uninstalled KSP 2 weeks ago due to some problems I was having. So on Monday I'll install a fresh clean 1.0 KSP and start again.

I'll be grabbing a new (update) copy, and installing it, but I'll not really start anything big with it until the mods I use catch up (which are very few, and just maybe now incorporated into the 1.0 release).
I will start playing KSP 1.0 as soon as possible. All those early access development versions are, to me, now pointless.

Why wouldn't I?

Actually no, I won't update. I'll just have a fresh install from a fresh download and leave my 0.90 install to languish beside my older installs in MyCloud
Everything up till now has been practice.....

Nope, gunna stick to version .90 forever.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T16:00:29Z" title="04/25/2015 04:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Majorjim**
  
Spot the sarcasm
lol, who won't be? Biggest update since .18 released docking

Been holding off KSP for a month to get the hunger back ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Probs spend a week or so in sandbox, playing with spaceplanes under the new aero while mods catch up, then launch a new career when I can put a decent pack together ^^

> 
> The real question is, who wont be?

That would be me. I've been having a lot of fun with Elite Dangerous and Subnautica lately and just can't seem to get much interest in KSP any more. Steam says I've gotten over 2000 hours into it so I've gotten my moneys worth, but I'm not really that curious about how the final version turned out.

Maybe in a couple of months once all my favourite mods are updated I'll have a look. (if 1.0 even has enough memory left for mods once it's running)

well sir.. this question is a littlebit... well how can I say that....how I am allow to say that.... aaw.. 

this is a software product and this has a lifecycle.. which starts at 1.0 ... all things before were just to to test it..
Not for a week or so, still have one project to finish and the download server will melt come monday. i hope they fix the patcher, ill do it that way.
Not immediately; got some projects to finish in 0.90 and I assume there'll be some initial bugs to be ironed out. I usually download a new version a week or 2 after release.
If a good resource mod comes out I will, otherwise I might wait for multiplayer.

Greetings,

Yeppers this is a NO-Brainer not to update !

In fact I just got done with major resource development in my KSP 'SIM' and I am ready !!

I will stream everything from day 1 however it will be a good week more or less as I have to work on the tech tree and wait for MODS rto be updated:

Mechjeb will need a MAJOR rewrite - I dont depend on it and can wait but I can start harr !!

Tech Manager will need to be updated and checked then I am ready to go !

All resource MODS I have will be left untouched and tested in 1.0 - I expect no changes but will be on the lookout for updates.

For the most part my entire KSP game is ready to rock and roll into 1.0 !

Catch me Live when I am ready and I will announce in my stream thread; probly in about a week.

Cmdr Zeta
Immediately.
ive honestly had no motivation to start new ksp projects, knowing it all needs to hard reset on the 27th, so im downloading soon as its availible

Well, like, yeah...

On a side note, I have 8 unmodded copies of KSP, from 0.20.2 to 0.90 (ARM inclusive), and 1 modded copy. What else will I do with 1 TB of HDD space?
Way too interested in the new features not to. Building ridiculously fast and maneuverable planes has been my thing recently. New aero model is gonna be so much fun to play around in. AIRBRAKES!!!
I probably will eventually but not as soon as it comes out.

> 
> Yes, yes, yes. Biggest update in a long time, possibly ever. I may not even wait for mods to update.

Ditto to this - going to be my first 100% vanilla career save lol.

I will be upgrading to 1.0.

Then I'll play for an hour or so, get bored with tiny tiny kerbin, and go play prison architect until RSS and FAR are updated. The full upgrade will take a while.
